thread.title: Mama June Shannon's Trainer Says She's Not 'Committed' to Losing Weight in 'From Not to Hot' Sneak Peek
thread.title_full: Mama June Shannon's Trainer Says She's Not 'Committed' to Losing Weight in 'From Not to Hot' Sneak Peek

title: Mama June Shannon's Trainer Says She's Not 'Committed' to Losing Weight in 'From Not to Hot' Sneak Peek
text:
Mama June Denies Wearing a Fat Suit: ‘I Would Never Do That’ 
The pair later head indoors so that Shannon can check her weight, and neither of them is pleased that she is 199 pounds. "OK, but when I talk to my manager, I need to be, like, low 190s to have the surgery," a concerned Shannon says. And Crooks tells the camera, "Now I'm over here doing the math, and I'm thinking, 'With all the work that we've been doing, she still should be dropping more weight.' I'm starting to wonder if she's really committed to this thing." Single Celebrity Super Moms Who Do It All! 
Watch the clip above to see the workout regimen that helped the reality TV stalwart drop from 460 pounds to a size 4 over the course of the season. Mama June: From Not to Hot airs on We TV Fridays at 10 p.m. ET.
